biotools.summary: Classification tool using Discriminative K-mers and Approximate Matching algorithm (CDKAM) is a new metagenome sequence classification tool for the third generation sequencing data with high error rates. CDKAM is a taxonomic classification tool using discriminative k-mers and approximate matching strategies.

bioschemas.name: CDKAM
